fa_IR {
    Version { "3.0" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimeElements:intvector {
                7,      // Saturday
                1,
            }
        }
    }
    NumberPatterns {
        "#,##0.###;\u2212#,##0.###",
        "#,##0 \u00a4;\u2212#,##0 \u00a4",
        "%#,##0",
        "#E0",
    }
    NumberElements { 
        "\u066B",
        "\u066C",
        ";",
        "\u066A",
        "\u06F0",
        "#",
        "-",
        "\u00D7\u06F1\u06F0^",
        "\u2030",
        "\u221E",
        "\uFFFD",
        "\u066B",
        "+",
    }
}
